name: unittest-mirror_matchers
comment:
unittest.mirror_matchers has been moved to the matcher package.

Add matcher to your pubspec.yaml file and import it via import 'package:matcher/mirror_matchers.dart';

hasProperty.name: hasProperty
hasProperty.comment: Returns a matcher that checks if a class instance has a property with name unittest/unittest-mirror_matchers.hasProperty.name, and optionally, if that property in turn satisfies a unittest/unittest-mirror_matchers.hasProperty.matcher.
